content:
Currently as far as I have experienced the documentation and GitHub page there is very poor explanation of wasmtime's internals and also no explanation for structure and uses of code in it.
There was one conversation but it washed away in middle of some other discussion.
It be very helpful if er have any blog/doc on it so that an outsider can know and start learning about what how wasmtime works and how one can start hacking on it.
@Dan Gohman what do you think
@Shivam Balikondwar I agree it would be very valuable to have more documentation on Wasmtime's internals.
